name: Mao's Adventure
description:
Be the hero that saves the land from the evil ninjas!

I started this project over 1 year ago as just a testbed for ideas I had, there was no real game only code and two scenes to test it out ... and then I didn't touch it for about 8 months. When I came back to it, I realised I had a lot of solid code in this project (I had a combat/health system, AI, inventory and so on) and decided I should put it to use, so I cobbled together some levels to show off the different things I had made. Although I must admit I went a bit into the weird end with this game.
